conclusion: Plan to analyze the image to understand geometry and light path, calculate distance, and find propagation time.
Image shows cross-sectional view of water polo with central and outer circles, inner radius R, outer radius 8R/3, light ray at 30°.
Identify key elements: inner radius R, outer radius 8R/3, angle of incidence 30°.
Calculate distance: light travels from incidence to inner surface (R), inner to outer surface (5R/3), back to incidence (R). Total distance is 11R/3.
Use speed of light c to find propagation time: total distance divided by speed of light.
